text: Conella is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Columbellidae, the dove snails. ==Species== Species within the genus Conella include: * Conella ovulata (Lamarck, 1822) * Conella ovuloides (C. B. Adams, 1850) ==References== ==External links== * de Maintenon M. J. (2005). "Phylogenetic relationships of the tropical American columbellid taxa Conella, Eurypyrene, and Parametaria (Gastropoda: Neogastropoda)". Journal of Paleontology 79(3): 497-508. . Category:Columbellidae
title: Conella
